SEARCH
Package org.carrot2.labs.smartsprites

Class SmartSpritesParameters

java.lang.Object
org.carrot2.labs.smartsprites.SmartSpritesParameters
public final class SmartSpritesParameters extends Object
Contains invocation parameters for SmartSprites, provides methods for validating the parameters.

    DEFAULT_MARK_SPRITE_IMAGES
    By default, we don't generate sprite directive in output css.
    static final SmartSpritesParameters.PngDepth
    DEFAULT_SPRITE_PNG_DEPTH
    By default, we use full color only when necessary.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SmartSpritesParameters()
    Creates the parameters with default options and null root dir, before root dir is set, the parameters are invalid.

  • Constructor Details

    • SmartSpritesParameters

      public SmartSpritesParameters()
      Creates the parameters with default options and null root dir, before root dir is set, the parameters are invalid.

    • SmartSpritesParameters

      public SmartSpritesParameters(String rootDir)
      Creates the parameters with most default values.
      Parameters:
      rootDir - the root dir

    • SmartSpritesParameters

      public SmartSpritesParameters(String rootDir, List<String> cssFiles, String outputDir, String documentRootDir, Message.MessageLevel logLevel, String cssFileSuffix, SmartSpritesParameters.PngDepth spritePngDepth, String cssEncoding)
      Creates the parameters.
      Parameters:
      rootDir - the root dir
      cssFiles - the css files
      outputDir - the output dir
      documentRootDir - the document root dir
      logLevel - the log level
      cssFileSuffix - the css file suffix
      spritePngDepth - the sprite png depth
      cssEncoding - the css encoding

    • SmartSpritesParameters

      public SmartSpritesParameters(String rootDir, List<String> cssFiles, String outputDir, String documentRootDir, Message.MessageLevel logLevel, String cssFileSuffix, SmartSpritesParameters.PngDepth spritePngDepth, String cssEncoding, boolean markSpriteImages)

      outputDir - the output dir
      documentRootDir - the document root dir
      logLevel - the log level
      cssFileSuffix - the css file suffix
      spritePngDepth - the sprite png depth
      cssEncoding - the css encoding
      markSpriteImages - the mark sprite images

  • Method Details

    • validate

      public boolean validate(MessageLog log)
      Validates the provided parameters. All resource paths are resolved against the local file system.
      Parameters:
      log - the log
      Returns:
      true if the parameters are valid
